snippet: The missionary, John Short, had asked for leniency after he was accused of secretly distributing Christian materials while visiting a Buddhist temple in Pyongyang.
abstract: North Korea says it will expel John Short, Australian Christian missionary arrested in February for secretly distributing Christian materials in Pyongyang.
lead_paragraph: The missionary, John Short, had asked for leniency after he was accused of secretly distributing Christian materials while visiting a Buddhist temple in Pyongyang.

headline.main: North Korean Officials Expel Elderly Australian Evangelist
headline.print_headline: North Korean Officials Expel Elderly Australian Evangelist
